wikipedia_page.main: Greenfly is the artist name of Lawrence Green, a drum and bass music producer and DJ from Reading, England. His music style leans towards the more soul/funk influenced styles of drum'n'bass. He is currently signed to FF Recordings and has been releasing music since 2001. Greenfly also co-runs Subfactory, a free weekly drum'n'bass event in Reading, Berkshire, England.

response: * Greenfly (producer), the artist name of Lawrence Green, an English drum and bass music producer
